official_title: A Study on the Effect Diet Has Affecting the Response of Patients Taking N-111 Who Are on a Vegetarian Diet Vs a Non-vegetarian Diet or a Placebo
inclusion_criteria:
* A positive diagnosis of breast cancer as determined by Fine Needle Biopsy or open biopsy with associated Cancer Antigen blood markers.
* Prostate cancer as determined by a Transrectal Biopsy with associated Prostate- specific antigen blood work.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 25 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusion_criteria: * â€¢Patients without the positive diagnosis of breast or prostate cancer.
